SC2Spa.pl.draw_cb

SC2Spa.pl.draw_cb(cmap='Reds', figsize=(9, 1.5), save='colorbar_reds', size=28)

Draw an independent color bar figure

The color bar will be saved as save+”.png”

size

size of all text

figsize

figure size

cmap

colormap. See matplotlib

None
